snippet: The Mets, who have used six players at the injury-plagued shortstop position this season, made Gavin Cecchini, 18, the No. 12 overall pick in Monday’s draft.
abstract: New York Mets make Gavin Cecchini, a high school shortstop prospect, the No. 12 overall pick in the baseball draft for first-year players.
lead_paragraph: The Mets, who have used six players at the injury-plagued shortstop position this season, made Gavin Cecchini, 18, the No. 12 overall pick in Monday’s draft.

headline.seo: Mets Draft High School Shortstop in First Round
headline.main: Fast High School Shortstop Taken by Mets in First Round
headline.print_headline: Fast High School Shortstop Taken by Mets in First Round
